column1: Americans are dying and Mitch McConnell is forcing the Senate to confirm judges. We need to pass Covid relief NOW.
Mitch McConnell is balking at a big Covid relief bill to save American lives but he jumped at the chance to pass nearly $2 trillion in tax breaks for the richest Americans.
Remember when Trump said we'd stop talking about Covid-19 after the election?
Oregon reported its highest number of new Covid infections today. Please wear a mask and stay home as much as you can. Stay safe Oregon!

.@JoeBiden isn't even president yet but he's sure acting like one by introducing a Covid-19 task force to take on the pandemic on day one. Thank you President-elect Biden for taking the pandemic seriously.
Trump doesn't care about the more than 225000 Americans we have lost to Covid. He only cares about himself. Vote him out. https://t.co/Hf5qhuoBsZ

.@JoeBiden has a plan for: Covid relief Climate chaos Health care Job creation Education And so much more.  Trump and the Republicans? They want to give tax breaks to corporations and kick millions of people off their health care. That's it.
I've said it before and I'll say it again: We shouldn't be holding confirmation hearings. We should be voting on a Covid relief bill.
We shouldn't be holding confirmation hearings right now. We should be voting on a Covid relief bill.
Mitch McConnell rushing a vote on a Supreme Court justice while he's been sitting on a Covid relief bill for months says all you need to know. Vote on November 3rd. https://t.co/UM243I6Wcv

After Trump SAID he was stopping travel from China due to the coronavirus he ACTUALLY allowed 1300 more direct flights carrying 40000 people from China into 17 U.S. cities greatly magnifying the spread of the deadly disease.
Trump has no plan. No plan for Covid-19. No plan for health care. No plan for the economy. No plan for America. The choice is clear: @JoeBiden

You're ready to deliver? Really? Because the House passed a comprehensive bill over three months ago but you refused to negotiate for months and still haven't put a coronavirus relief bill on the floor of the Senate. https://t.co/3bcZIHbmPj

Every day that Mitch McConnell waits to pass another Covid-19 relief bill someone loses their business their home their livelihoods. He has abandoned the American people. He has abandoned the people of Kentucky.

When Senate Republicans roll out a COVID “aid” bill that gives tax deductions for corporate lunches but doesn’t expand food security assistance protect renters or include hazard pay for essential workers https://t.co/jzDVNAcsvB

As much as I love being home in Oregon I shouldn't be here right now. I should be in our nation's capital working to pass another Covid-19 relief bill. But Mitch McConnell is refusing to do the work. It’s a shameful dereliction of duty.

Here's my to-do list for the next 119 days:  ⏺Fight systemic racism ⏺Fix the Constitution (#Amend13) ⏺Get emergency COVID aid to American people ⏺Demand Equality for All   ⏺Hold Trump accountable  ⏺Flip the Senate ⏺Elect @JoeBiden president  Who's in?

More than 130000 Americans have died of COVID-19. Many of those could still be alive today if Trump and other Republican officials hadn't ignored ridiculed and undermined scientific facts. The climate crisis is no different. We have to act. https://t.co/IS6WEfS45r

Systemic racism is being statistically more likely to be harmed or die from police brutality gun violence COVID-19 treatable diseases malnutrition unsafe drinking water severe weather AND MORE simply because of the color of your skin. #WearOrange because #BlackLivesMatter. https://t.co/jKvYeOcTYl

This new CDC data is alarming. The human toll of COVID-19 is likely far greater than previously reported. We still have so much to learn about this disease but one thing is very clear from these charts: this is not "just a flu" and we NEED. TESTING. NOW. https://t.co/v2HTlp3eSR https://t.co/F7P82e9fRw
Just because you don’t have symptoms doesn’t mean you can’t spread the coronavirus to those you love. Stay home. Stay isolated.  https://t.co/WuwJrj4HMP

Vote by mail works here in Oregon and expanding this program nationwide will increase voter participation and protect people in times like these. We cannot allow the coronavirus to hold November's election hostage. https://t.co/ORlBLb4EfW

The #coronavirus will touch every aspect of our lives and our economy. Congress’s actions must be big broad and immediate — and focus on supporting the economy from working families up not well-connected industries down.

I've said it before & I'll say it again: show me someone's budget & you show me their values. Donald Trump continues to push tax cuts for billionaires but wants to fund our coronavirus emergency response by cutting heating programs for low-income families. https://t.co/VoiFNSX7j4

I am working closely with the Governor FDA and other officials as the situation in Oregon unfolds. At this time @CDCgov & @OHAOregon simply recommend the same preventive steps you’d take for the standard flu. #coronavirus https://t.co/LVrGAnstfq
